# ML_Ocr_app

![Streamlit](https://img.shields.io/badge/-Streamlit-white?logo=streamlit&logoColor=FF4B4B)
![Hugging Face](https://img.shields.io/badge/-Hugging%20Face-white?logo=data:image/png;base64,)
![EasyOcr](https://img.shields.io/badge/-EasyOcr-white)


**ML_OCR_App** can convert picture to text.The picture must contain English.

# How to use ?

1. Use the [streamlit application](https://delroso-ml-ocr-app-streamlit-app-app-2rx2sv.streamlit.app/).

![step 1](docs/steamli_app.jpg)

2. Drag and drop or upload a file.

![step 2](docs/drop.jpg)

3. Wait for the download and get a response.

![step 3](docs/final.jpg)
